participant_1.background:
I like to look my best even when I'm at work.
I spend my days drawing, painting and making games that help animals in need.
I love listening to Tool while I'm working on my stamp collection and taking care of my dogs.
I'm happy to have a beautiful home and get to share my passion for gaming with others.
i am 21 years old.

i wish i could live in a fantasy world.

content.text: Hi! How is your day going?
My day is going pretty well so far! I just moved to a new city and I'm trying to get settled in.
That's awesome! I'm glad to hear that you're having a good day. I hope your move goes smoothly.
Thanks! I'm really excited about it. I'm looking forward to meeting new people and exploring my new city.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'm sure you're going to have a great time.
Thanks! I hope so too.
What are some of your hobbies?
I love to read, draw, and play video games.
Oh, that's cool! I love to read too. What are some of your favorite books?
I love fantasy and sci-fi books. I'm currently reading the Wheel of Time series by Robert Jordan.
Oh, I've heard good things about that series. I've never read it, but I've been meaning to check it out.
You should! It's really good.
I will!
What video games do you like to play?
I love playing open-world games like Skyrim and The Witcher 3.
Oh, I love those games too! I'm a big fan of Bethesda games.
Me too! They're the best.
I'm so glad I found someone who shares my interests!
Me too! It's always nice to meet someone who likes the same things you do.
Yeah, it is.
Well, it was nice talking to you! I hope you have a great day.
You too! It was nice talking to you too.
